document.full_text: mr. laurents was a playwright, screenwriter and director who wrote and ultimately transformed two of broadway's landmark shows, 'gypsy' and 'west side story.'
document.title: arthur laurents, playwright and director on broadway, dies at 93
lines_and_colors: mr. laurents was a playwright, screenwriter and director who wrote and ultimately transformed two of broadway's landmark shows, 'gypsy' and 'west side story.'
